comprehensive_overview: r-gridextra is an R package that provides a set of functions to enhance and extend the grid graphics system in R, allowing for more flexibility and customizability in creating and arranging plots.
core_features: Offers additional functionality and customization options for grid-based plots in R
Enables easy creation of complex multi-plot layouts and annotations
Supports the arrangement of plots in grids with different configurations
Facilitates the addition of custom grobs and decorations to plots
